next_steps.note: Write a single, short poem (8-12 lines) as a starting point, focusing on one of the brainstormed themes. Add to 'Progress' as 'First Draft - [Theme]'.
Research and identify 2-3 poets whose style resonates with your intended direction. Document in 'Ideas' as 'Inspirational Poets'.
Define the desired overall 'tone' or 'mood' for the poetry (e.g., melancholic, hopeful, satirical). Add to 'Ideas'.
Establish a basic structure or format for tracking poem drafts (e.g., a simple file naming convention or a dedicated section in the project board). Document this in 'Ideas'.
Brainstorm potential themes or subjects for the poetry (addressing 'Ideas' being empty).
Draft a short poem (5-10 lines) as a starting point, even if it's rough (starting 'Progress').
Research and select 2-3 poets whose style resonates with your vision for the project (addressing potential stylistic issues).
Define the overall scope of the project - will this be a collection, a single long-form poem, or something else? (clarifying '4 next steps pending').
Identify a feedback mechanism - who will review drafts and provide constructive criticism? (addressing potential issues and moving toward completion)
